title: Quarkus Update - Provide either a GitHub App or a workflow to update Quarkus in GitHub repositories

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

body:
At the moment, Quarkus is updated by Dependabot in GitHub repositories which is often counter productive as it misses all the nice changes provided by `quarkus update`.

We could imagine that we could have a workflow to create update PRs that would be created by `quarkus update`.
This could be experimented in a few Quarkiverse extensions before being generalized in the Quarkiverse template.

We could even imagine having a GitHub App that would handle this. But that's probably something for later especially since I'm not sure it is easy to run quarkus update on random projects in a secure way. I'm pretty sure you could easily execute anything on the host with a carefully crafted Maven project.
